name: They're coming.
description:
This game was made for Ludum Dare 43 in under 48 hours.

The Zombieapokalype has started. Some survivors ask you to help them to defend themself by building a wall out of bodies. Sacrifice part of them to keep the rest alive. And choose wisely which properties to give to your knight.

They are coming.

Unity Project:

https://www.dropbox.com/s/rt6e60skmyl3tw6/LD43.zip?dl=0
